Step 1: Introduction to Firearms Safety
----------------------------------------

#### i. Always assume a firearm is loaded.
#### ii. Never touch a firearm without permission.
#### iii. Always point the firearm in a safe direction.
#### iv. Keep your finger off the trigger until you are ready to shoot.

Step 2: Teaching Children How to Handle Firearms
----------------------------------------------

### a. Teach children how to properly hold a firearm, including how to grip and support the weapon.
### b. Practice holding and handling a firearm under adult supervision.
### c. Teach children how to safely load and unload a firearm.
##
